availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Kirby Martin (Christian County, Kentucky, resident & Arkansas farmer)

body.p: Christian County, Kentucky, resident. Christian County, Kentucky, native. Son of John Martin and Happy Martin. Married to Cecily Ann Armstrong Martin in Christian County, Kentucky, on October 3, 1853. Father of Mary Susan Martin and Andrew Jackson Martin. Student in Christian County in 1850. Resident in Christian County, Kentucky, until 1860. Farmer in Sebastian County, Arkansas, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Christian County, District 1, p. 493A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Arkansas, Sebastian County, Center, p. 1066.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1914), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994032, Christian County Marriages.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #22164.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #483.
